channel.title: How to make a server message
channel.description: [size=12pt]How do I make a server message that says a new person logged in. Example: [Server] Welcome "Tim" to PwnerScape he has logged in for the first time![/size] [b]Thanks for your time! -Jim[/b]

item.title: How to make a server message

item.title: How to make a server message
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Ok you need to add if (playerRights >= 0) { yell(" "+playerName+ " has logged in"); } to your client.java in your source folder. Once you have opened that file up, scroll down until you reach a welcome message(that is if you have a welcome message).I will show you what I am talking about.sM("@red@Welcome To YOUR SERVER!"); sM("@red@Thank You For Choosing YOUR SERVER, Have A Nice Day!"); if(playerRights >= 0){ { yell("Server- " +playerName+ " has logged in"); } As you can see, the Server login message should be located right after your welcome message for a fully working effect.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a server message

item.title: How to make a server message
item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

Uhh thats not it but… where would I put that if I were to use that? …Back to the main topic, I am looking for the server to announce when a new players logs in for the first time. Thanks for replying so fast.
[size=18pt]Edit: btw this is for a 317 source[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a server message

item.title: How to make a server message
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

I hope this is what you were looking for…if (playerRights == 3) { yell("Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"); } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Blanche")) { yell("Head Admin " +playerName+ " has logged in"); } else if (playerRights == 2) { yell("Server Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in"); } else if (playerRights == 1) { yell("Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in"); } else if (playerRights == 4) { yell("Player " +playerName + " has logged in"); } else if (playerRights == 0) { yell("Player " +playerName+ " has logged in"); } Reply if it’s not

Read full topic
